name: Slack
description: Connect Agent Zero to Slack workspaces. Responds to DMs, @mentions, and slash commands.

app_token.label: App-Level Token
app_token.description: Slack App-Level Token for Socket Mode (xapp-...)

signing_secret.label: Signing Secret
signing_secret.description: Slack app signing secret for request verification

allowed_channels.label: Allowed Channels
allowed_channels.description: Comma-separated channel IDs the bot can respond in. Leave empty for all.

respond_to_dms.label: Respond to DMs
respond_to_dms.description: Allow the bot to respond to direct messages

respond_to_mentions.label: Respond to Mentions
respond_to_mentions.description: Allow the bot to respond when @mentioned in channels
